first_para: (Andrew) John Stevenson (born 4 July 1963) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Carlisle, when winning the seat from Labour.

full.extract:
(Andrew) John Stevenson (born 4 July 1963) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Carlisle, when winning the seat from Labour.
^ http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm/cmregmem/110124/part2.htm
full.title: John Stevenson (British politician)
